title: PC crashes on game start
body:
For the past week or so I've been put into 20 minute low priority queues because every time I start a game my entire PC crashes and I have to reset.
I've already attempted to reinstall, repair, and I even factory reset my PC to see if the problem would fix itself but it was to no avail. The crash is not 100% of the time I would play 2-3 games fine and then on the 3-4 I would crash as soon as the game goes from character loading screen to the actual game, and sometimes its back to back crashes.
{{sticker:cass-cry}} 
Orthropayload24

replies.body: If those crashes are always happening on the loading screen the main issue might be connection related. If your network drops the connection with our server in the middle of loading it can sometimes cause these crashes. Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying close attention to port forwarding and how to flush your DNS.

I don't know your exact problem, there could be something wrong with your computer, but since I have no information on the specs/age/use of the computer than I can't give you a direct answer. I have had problems where my client wouldn't load in, and after I used the league of legends installer to uninstall league from my computer and then reinstall the game my client worked fine.

Edit: I now have the link to the installer, [](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/download)
